body_html:
For queues I recommend using a single queue for both images and labels. This is why all queues support tuples of Tensors.

What's the advantage of separate queues, if the enqueues and dequeues need to match, and so need any internal shuffling and whatnot?

body:
For queues I recommend using a single queue for both images and labels. This is why all queues support tuples of Tensors.

What's the advantage of separate queues, if the enqueues and dequeues need to match, and so need any internal shuffling and whatnot?
